DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine patient variables, physician presenter variables, and information variables that might affect clinical decision making in asymptomatic carotid stenosis. The hypothesis is that information variables are the most significant determinant of clinical decision making.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Trial of Clinical Decision Making in Asymptomatic Carotid Stenosis
DOC.criteria: No known history of carotid stenosis History of dementia Unable to read English
